places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL CRYSTAL INN
address: Annabhau Sathe Chowk, XQW3+3H3 Vardaman Chambers, Jalana Rd, near Reliance Trend, sathechouk, Beed, Maharashtra 431122, India

reviews.text:
One of the best hotels to stay in Beed. Safe and secure. Room service is prompt and quick. The quality of food is too good and there are more varieties to try. The cost is also affordable and not pricey...
The room and toilets are well maintained and no complaints.

My time at Crystal Inn in Beed City was awful. The hotel didn't deliver on its promises, the staff acted rudely like local troublemakers, and it didn't feel safe for families. On top of that, they didn't stick to the prices they initially quoted, making the whole experience even worse.

It was a bad stay the bed sheets literally have holes in them and juice was so bitter even when I added sugar it was bitter and tea was very cold after telling that to the staff they sent another tea but still it was cold and it took 30 for only tea and bread and 45 mins for juice.the beds ok ok but not the matress

It's a good hotel to stay in Beed. Rooms and toilet was clean. Hot water was available in toilet. Complimentary breakfast was ok. They have basement and ground level parking available. Food in their restaurant was ok.
Good hotel to stay with family..staff is cooperative good service rooms are clean but bathroom need to be more clean

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Golden Choice
address: someshwar Mandir, Driving School St, oppozite, Beed, Maharashtra 431122, India

reviews.text: It was a nice stay overall. Had taken the family interconnected room and it was very convenient and spacious. Both the rooms had AC. Only things that I felt needed attention was 1) the choice of food and availability and 2) the bathroom room is scrambled beside the connecting doors and either one needs to be shut for the other to open.

It's a good hotel for a stay.
They have a restaurant for breakfast and dinner.
Parking space is also available in front of the hotel.
Rooms are quite spacious with a balcony.

Cleanliness can be improved for making the stay more pleasant.(Pest control needs to be checked out periodically)

I'm giving a review for my stay

The manager is not proficient, it's not okay to take customers for granted.
Your messages will not be heard and conveyed properly.

They will call u n say they are  shifting your luggage in your absence (you will be in your important business outside).  They will say they have bulk booking and want your room vacant for the same.
I switched to another hotel after this incident.
They will keep you disturbed for unnecessary reasons.
Rooms:
Many cockroaches in every room.
No complimentary drinking water in the rooms.
Many faults in construction. Some rooms especially need to be vastu compliant for ex. mirrors on the south wall and washrooms at North East corner.(well it's upto their perception)

There are chances.... in future someone will surely fall from such "Blind steps" which appear after getting out of the lift(photo posted)...need to rectify at the earliest.

The only positive thing is food at taste.

They need much more effort to give service as equal as 3* for lodging.

Better for visiting the restaurant for food.

Good enough rooms for a quick stopover or a few days stay. I stayed for just 1 nightz with family and while traveling across the state.

The services are good and fast. Reception check-in was fast. Their restaurant caters to food requests in-house and till 2300 hours.
Deluxe rooms are priced in the 2000-3000 range and it meets expectations in this range.  There's a paan shop in the parking itself.

Bathrooms are decent but can be better cleaned. Solar geyser provides stored hot water through the night. Basic toiletries are provided.

When leaving the place, consider leaving early in the morning to avoid the rush hour traffic of the city. Folks in smaller towns wake up early :) I saw 2 large gatherings of 50+ people on the road before 0700!
Excellent stay. Nice food. Nice location. Nice room ambience. Staff is cooperative.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Grand Yashoda
address: Solapur Aurangabad Highway, Driving School St, Sahara Colony, Swaraj Nagar, Beed, Maharashtra 431122, India

reviews.text:
Very conveniently located. Relatively new construction hence rooms and bathrooms were nice, modern style and clean. Toiletries were supplied. The restaurant is really good. Food is very tasty here.
Cons- I had a feeling that linen were not changed after every use. Thankfully I had my own in the car so used it for a nights sleep .

The important feature of the hotel is the test the food here is so tasty delight delicious serving time is little quality and observation is best food quality also much greater per person the average bill becomes about 200 to 300 there is also beautiful garden there is lighting very beautiful day results over rooftop everything here is good parking also good this is indeed a grand hotel

The food was very tasty, some of the best in the beed. The service was awesome especially Mr. Kamal singh he was very helpful in selecting the dishes and very pleasant. The restaurant also has very nice ambience.

Had a great dinner with friends... The waiters provided a very good service especially our atendee Mr. Kamal Singh who even did suggest us our meal .Overrall the staff was very pleasant and food was very tasty
The food was of great quality and I loved the taste 🤩, ambience of hotel is nice , the service provided by Mr. Kamal is a good man , he was polite and experienced .

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Yashraj Inn , Beed
address: Jalana Rd, Hina Nagar, Sawata Nagar, Beed, Maharashtra 431122, India

reviews.text: Overall service was really good. we really loved the taste. The ambience was kid friendly. Pocket friendly restaurant. Go for it.

I am so happy to stay in Yashraj inn Hotel. I was on the way to go Shirdi Sai baba. Here Room size is very big with neat and clean. Inside room you can feel like your staying in 3 star hotel. Service & Staff is soo good and cooperative as well.
1. If you are going with big family you can take extra charges
2. You can get here Dinner and lunch
3.You will get complimentary sandwich Grill.
4. Owner of the Hotel is very nice.
5. You can stay with your kids.
Good service and Quality of room is good with affordable rent.
One of the best veg restaurant in beed, various food options are available.
The cheapest hotel in Beed City for a birthday celebration when compared to other options.

reviews.text:
Bad experience
1) Staff behaviour is very rude
2) no hot water facility
3) AC not working
4) only Drunk people stay here.
5) No hygiene.
Super friendly staff & delicious food. Everything great :)

Very bad service….No locks in washroom…very unhygienic washroom…flush not working….No bedsheet…bring your own bedsheet, pillow, towel, soap if you are willing to stay at this hotel…No dustbin as well….very very very bad service

The food was of awesome Quality, the service provided to us by waiter was just perfect, nothing more nothing less. They also have Lodging facility just behind the restaurant with quality rooms AC Nd Non-AC both options available for effective cost. Do Visit.
